title: Principled businessman whose scooter revolution changed lives, landscape
description: Workers who TOI spoke to remembered Bajaj as a father figure who not just provided them with livelihood, but also taught them how to do business ethically. They recalled how Bajaj used to interact with them with love and affection. Most said they were mesmerised by his ability to recall their names.
